Howard Miller

  1. Foster Name: Howard
  2. Foster Family: Goerge E. Bedea
  3. Location of Family: Table Rock, NE
  4. Sending Organization: n/a
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1916
  8. Date of Death: 1944-04-29, Rulo
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Margaret Wissler
  11. Notes: Died in car accident according to Pawnee Republican
  12. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Pawnee Republican, 4 May 1944.
